## Let's add some knitr line number interference

This should make it harder for the lines to come out right:

```{r}
rnorm(100)
```

## Syntax Errors in cell with YAML

```{ojs}
//| echo: true


// Let's forget this is JS to force a syntax error
viewof x = Inputs.range([0, 100], label = "hello!", value = 20)
```

### Fenced test

```{ojs}
//| echo: fenced


300 + 50
forceError_line_32
"good output 2"
forceError_line_34
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: fenced
//| some-yaml-to: ignore
300 + 50
forceError_line_41
"good output 2"
forceError_line_43
```

### non-fenced test

```{ojs}
//| echo: true
300 + 50
forceError_line_51
"good output 2"
forceError_line_53
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: true


forceError_line_60
forceError_line_61
"good output 2"
forceError_line_63
```
